column4: heelo i cant delete some files from my flash memory, saying " chmod: changing permissions of `/media/disk/.Trash-1000.exe': Read-only file system "   when i sudo chmod -R 777 /media/
it looks like the device mounted on /media/disk is mounted read only
this is a windows fs no?
llutz that also happends when its a windows fs that has a dirty flag on it and needs to be shutdown cleanly or chkdsk from M$
only whats  in quotes there =)
Dr_Willis  no not yet, i cant remove sthem
llutz  it says "Error removing file: Read-only file system" when i try to delete a dir
'sudo mount -o remount,rw,uid=1000 /media/disk'
llutz  no no no, it doesnt work
no, it doesnt
one second
'sudo mount -o force /media/disk'
donkarlo@donkarlo-desktop:~$ sudo mount -o force /media/disk
right 'sudo umount /media/disk && mount -o force /media/disk'
correction 'sudo umount /media/disk && sudo mount -o force /media/disk'
donkarlo@donkarlo-desktop:~$ sudo umount /media/disk && sudo mount -o force /media/disk
then after you unmount it with 'sudo umount /media/disk' given the device is /dev/sdb1 do.. 'sudo mount -o force /dev/sdb1 /media/disk'
are you thre?
yes
i suggest you look at squid documentation
my system hanged, i restarted it and ut doesnt work any more
you need to look at the logs as to why,, motaka2 you should make a point to always check the logs, and squid certainly has one
is the squid set up to autostart? how do you know it was working in the first place? had you made a request through the proxy or pointed your browser to it and confirmed it would relay requests?
be care full with your suggestions from now on
